column5: Hi all,  Spent our weekend at a beautiful spot , 4 hours from Toronto ( sorry location is a secret ) Weather was iffy, Friday and sat but Sunday and Monday were great , lots of small bass around a lb but we did manage 5 over 2lbs and a smallish about 3 and a sweet largie about 5 , top water and drop shotting were the key this weekend.
That's some nice look'n HAWGS SBK
